title: 33 How The Hidden Power of Words Inspire, Empower and Create Change with Mignon Fogarty
description: Ever wonder what the hidden power of words are? My next guest would cringe at the sight of the grammar on this blog as I often confuse Whom with Who, and Affect with Effect. For me, it's always been about the passion behind my words, not the grammar or structure (that may also be my [因
